it.unipi.ing.mim.facerecognition

Class SearchEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipi.ing.mim.facerecognition.SearchEngine

  • public class SearchEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides the methods used to search similar images in the database. It also contains a main used for testing.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SearchEngine()

      static void main(java.lang.String[] args) 
      void open(java.io.File storageFile)
      Loads the descriptors stored in the specified file as a ImgDescriptor list.
      java.util.List<ImgDescriptor> search(ImgDescriptor query, int k)
      Performs a sequential scan search on the descriptor list that represents the database in order to find the K most similar images (in terms of distance) to the specified query.

      Scans the database to find similar images to the face specified as Mat.

      • searchEngine

        public static java.util.List<ImgDescriptor> searchEngine(java.lang.String imgPath,
                                                         int K)
                                                  throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Scan the database to find similar images to the one specified by the path.
        Parameters:
        imgPath - is the path of the query image
        K - is the number of most similar images to search
        Returns:
        a list of descriptors of the K most similar images
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

      • searchEngine

        public static java.util.List<ImgDescriptor> searchEngine(org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Mat imgMat,
                                                         int K,
                                                         java.lang.String imgPath)
                                                  throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Scans the database to find similar images to the face specified as Mat.
        Parameters:
        imgMat - is the query face
        K - is the number of most similar images to search
        imgPath - is the path of the image from which the face has been taken
        Returns:
        a list of descriptors of the K most similar images
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

      • open

        public void open(java.io.File storageFile)
          throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                 java.io.IOException
        Loads the descriptors stored in the specified file as a ImgDescriptor list.
        Parameters:
        storageFile - is the file containing the the descriptors
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException, - IOException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException

      • search

        public java.util.List<ImgDescriptor> search(ImgDescriptor query,
                                            int k)
        Performs a sequential scan search on the descriptor list that represents the database in order to find the K most similar images (in terms of distance) to the specified query.
        Parameters:
        query - is the descriptor of the query image
        k - is the number of desired results
        Returns:
        a list containing the image descriptors of the k most similar images
